title: Tried every troubleshoot by google, full battery, pix 4a black screen won't power on New phone HELP!
content: I have a new pixal 4A, ( couple months old ) and charged it to 100 % before heading into work. After arriving at work  I pulled the phone out and the screen is black. The buttons seem to do nothing. I logged on to google and preformed every troubleshoot that google suggested . Hope someone has something new to try. Please HELP and thank you,    -Dennis
